title: DPS Best Of
itunes:title: DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to legendary Skateboarder Tony Hawk about his new HBO documentary, and the influence his dad had on his career. MLB announces a new way of communicating pitches between pitchers and catchers. DP's questions the point of implementing it now. And Reggie Miller makes his return to discuss all things NBA including who he sees as the frontrunners for the title this year. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
